title: Servage Classic Leather Posture Collar - High
description:
The Servage Classic Posture Collar High: Luxury leather, bondage at it's finest. Enhance your erotic BDSM and kink play with this exquisite posture collar exclusively from the House of SXN. This fashionable restraint is perfect for high-end bondage or pony fetish.  
This striking and dramatic collar is crafted from luxurious black leather, and inner padded to ensure a comfortable yet secure bondage restraint fit.  Metal D-rings accent the collar at three points and a metal buckle adorns the adjustable leather strap on the rear.  The High version of our posture collar features a substantial flare to restrict head and neck movement. 
 House of SXN: the finest in luxury bondage and BDSM restraints.
